column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mai says : " You need some help with that ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " Mai !
#Text=And it does n't hurt when the new Fire Lord is your boyfriend .
#Text=" Zuko says : " So does this mean you do n't hate me anymore ?
#Text=" Mai says : " I think it means I actually kind of like you .
#Text=But do n't ever break up with me again !
#Text=" Katara and Sokka says : " Dad !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I heard what you two did .
#Text=I am the proudest father in the world .
#Text=And your mother would be proud , too .
#Text=" Sokka says : " There 's my favorite warriors !
#Text=I have to admit , I kind of missed the face paint .
#Text=So how does it feel to be in uniform again ?
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " It feels great !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Careful , Suki !
#Text=Ty Lee is pretending to be a Kyoshi Warrior again .
#Text=" Suki says : " It 's okay .
#Text=She 's one of us now .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Yeah , the girls and I really bonded in prison .
#Text=And after a few chi blocking lessons , they said I could join their group .
#Text=We 're going to be best friends forever .
#Text="
